transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Ji sir, main aapko call kar rahi thi aapne uthaya nahi tha.
Executive: Baat sir baat ye hai na mam ki hum soche the ki hum pura apna homework le kar ke baithe tab hum aapse baat karein. Haan bataiye.
Customer: To aap abhi mobile pe hain ki system pe hain?
Customer: Mobile system ki aisi ki taisi pehle ye bataiye buylead mein chal kya raha hai hamare sath.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Hum ye jaanna chah rahe hain ki ye jo buylead aap log de rahe hain, hmm, aap log pagal wagal to nahi ho gaye hain puri tarike se kya utha ke diye de rahe hain. Customer gaali bak raha hai keh raha hai ki aisi ne aisi baat hai. Wo baitha hua Allahabad mein Lucknow ki buylead daal rahi hai.
Executive: Sir aap thoda baat karenge.
Customer: Abhi abhi turant abhi abhi turant maine ek buylead uthai hai wo keh raha hai ki bhaiya maine kuch aur dekhna tha ye ulta hua aap log rukiye abhi line pe lete hain customer ko ruko. Abhi line pe lete hain ab to aise nahi mante na abhi ruko line pe lete hain.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar abhi line pe lete hain abhi dekhiye customer kya bata raha hai. Turant ki buylead hai.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se
Customer: Unka number busy ja raha hai abhi rukiye zara ek minute. Hmm.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ye bhi nahi keh raha hai ek din pehle ki abhi turant ki buylead hai jaise maine uthaya keh raha hai bhaiya hum to kuch aur kar rahe the in logo ne ye kuch aur bana ke de diya.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat
Customer: Rukiye rahiye abhi unka number busy ja raha hai abhi hum le rahe hain line pe.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Abhi unka number busy hai mam. Haan abhi unka number busy hai.
Executive: Achcha koi nahi aap kar lijiyega. Aap mujhe bataiye kya keh rahe hain buylead pe?
Customer: Mam buylead itni bakwas aa rahi hai itni bekar si aa rahi hai mujhe gussa lag rahi hai main aap logo se kya baat karu mujhe samajh mein nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Bhai buylead utha rahe customer keh raha hai bhaiya humko Allahabad mein kaam karana sala location Lucknow ki dale pada wo keh raha hai bhai hum to Allahabad mein baithe hain. Uske baad abhi
Customer: Abhi buylead maine uthai jis jis mein fossil ki abhi turant ki uthai hui hai agar aap system pe check kar lijiye Rohit Kumar Mishra ke naam se hai. Keh raha hai bhaiya hum to kuch aur dekh rahe the usme stone ka humne apna video photo upload kar diya logo ne buylead bana ke de di aapko. Usi se baat karani hai iski recording bhi kariye maine apne whatsapp pe hai kariye abhi main aapko bhej du iski recording puri.
Executive: Aaj aapne do ye Rohit Mishra se baat ki aur ye Mohammad Nadeem se baat nahi kari nahi inse baat nahi kari Rohit Kumar Mishra se baat kariye abhi.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. Hmm.
Customer: Ek ek ek PVC door ka abhi humne baat kari usse kal ki buylead hai abhi usse maine baat kari aaj kal mujhe time nahi mila to keh raha hai bhaiya humko koi requirement hi nahi hai kaun keh raha hai ki humne to koi query nahi kari hai.
Executive: Sir ye bhi line pe le lu? Line pe le lu usko?
Customer: Aap aap aap sir main bolungi kuch ya nahi bolu aap mujhe bolne de kam se kam.
Customer: Aap humari baat ka jawab dijiye bas khali bas boliye baad mein. Haan bataiye kya keh rahi hain?
Executive: Bina bole to hum jawab nahi de payenge na sir.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Haan to hum bol rahe hain aap kal ki buylead aaj purchase karenge aapke alawa char log aur usse call karenge to uske agar deal ho jayegi wo aapko kyu bolega ki meri requirement thi.
Customer: Chaliye wo baat haan wo maine maan li abhi ki bataiye abhi jo maine uthai 15 minute pehle ki buylead hai wo kyu aisa keh raha hai?
Executive: Wo hum ek baar check karana padega sir ki agar location Lucknow likha hai to customer sir Allahabad kyu keh raha hai. Ye iska issue main check karwa sakti hu. Aur ye Rohit Kumar Mishra wali Rohit Kumar Mishra wali isko turant check kariye meri turant ki baat cheet hai abhi iski mujhse 10 minute pehle baat kari maine isse.
Executive: Sir aise turant to nahi check ho payega but main baat karti hu buyer ka mindset bhi koi nahi check kar sakta agar wo IndiaMART pe aate time buyer keh raha hai ki bhaiya humne buylead kuch hum aur kar rahe the logo ne jabardasti buylead bana ke de di aapko bataiye isme meri kya galti hai.
Customer: Kuch aur aur is location se to hum bahut pareshan ho chuke hain matlab har baar yahi cheez location ko lekar ke ab customer baitha hua Ambedkar Nagar Lucknow location padi wo baitha hua Pratapgarh Lucknow location padi hum Lucknow dekh ke utha rahe hain location waha kahin aur ki nikal rahi hai aise to meri buylead kharab ho rahi hai na baar baar.
Customer: Abhi dekhiye ek buylead ek ek buylead ko maine block kiya wo keh raha hai bhaiya hum khud hi yahi kaam karte par in logo ne buylead kaise bana di abhi uska ye hum de aapko block list mein padi hai meri abhi koi dhundna padega rukiye. Aisa abhi hum turant baat karwa sakte hain aapko. Ye bataiye haan ye ye buylead jo block wali hoti kaha dikhengi humko jo jo block kar dete hain hum log.
Executive: Aap jo buylead block wo not relevant karte hain na.
Customer: Nahi block karne ka option aata hai.
Executive: Block mobile app mein aata hai na sir?
Customer: Haan haan mobile app mein aata hai isme block karne ki facility kaha milegi?
Executive: Settings pe jaake milegi aapko.
Customer: Rukiye line pe rahiye. Abhi aaj jo maine buylead uthai wo dikh rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Haan aaj jo aapne buylead purchase ki teen buylead pe aapki baat hui hai main bata deti hu ek second. Ek wo Rohit wali jo aap keh rahe hain, ek Mohammad Nadeem se maybe aapne inhe call nahi kiya hoga aapne inhe message kuch kiya hoga. Teesri koi ek Ahaan hai Ahaan. 18 tarikh ki Ahaan. 18 tarikh ko teen buylead baat teen buylead pe aapne baat ki. naam hai. Sir yaha pe Ahaan mention hai mujhe nahi pata unhone aur kya dala hai kya nahi.
Customer: Yaar humko ye bataiye block wali buylead dikhengi kaha pe?
Executive: Aap settings pe jaaye?
Customer: Haan gaye.
Executive: Ab waha pe dekhiye kya kya options dikh rahe hain aapko?
Customer: Setting mein gaye to humko haan notification PNS setting ye to dikh raha hai buylead latest buylead tender business inquiry.
Executive: Buylead by buylead pe call kariye waha pe.
Customer: Buylead pe matlab wo wo bana hua hai on off karne wala switch karne wala.
Executive: Sir wahi kahin dekhiye mujhe bhi exact nahi pata ki mobile system pe kaha dikhta hai mobile app pe kaha dikhega block ka lead. Main aapko check karke bata dungi.
Executive: Customer ne lead block ki hui hai sir mobile app pe kaha dikhega. Hmm hmm. Hamare seller ne kiya hua hai ek customer ko mobile app se buylead pe block kiya hai.
Customer: Maine maine uski buylead ko block kiya wo buylead kaha dikhegi jo block ki hui buylead hai wo.
Executive: Haan sir maine bola na ki mujhe mobile app pe iska idea nahi hai ki blocked buylead kis jagah dikhengi main check karke ek baar aap buylead pe jaake jo udhar right side mein three dots hai dekhiye waha pe kuch options dikh rahe hain aapko?
Customer: Ek minute rukiye. Haan haan buylead pe click karke jo right side mein three dot dikhta hai.
Customer: Hmm dikha usme hidden leads hai block likha likh gaya dikh gaya. Haan block ke naam se haan aa gaya ye Shubham Yadav ke naam se.
Customer: Abhi rukiye ek minute main aapko samne call kar raha hu.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko Shubham Yadav ke naam se buylead hai ye.
Customer: Shubham Yadav ke naam se.
Customer: Achcha. Hmm isko maine aaj hi uthaya abhi thodi der pehle ye khud yahi kaam karta hai jo hum log kaam kar rahe hain bataiye same vendor bhida rahe hain buylead ke naam pe.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Kya hai ye sab kya tamasha laga rakha hai aap logo ne?
Customer: Hum ek buylead se hum din bhar mein teen buylead utha rahe hain un teeno mein yahi sunte rahe ek bata raha hai out of city hai fir ek call aa gaya rukiye. Kaun se baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se Hello?
Customer: Haan. Bhaiya aapki buylead abhi aayi thi aapse baat hui thi na meri abhi?
Customer: Haan haan. Haan to ye IndiaMART wale line pe hain madam zara baat kariye inse puchiye inhone query ki thi ki nahi ki thi.
Executive: Haan ji bataiye sir aapki requirement thi?
Customer: Haan haan thi. Ji. Kya kaha se hain aap Lucknow se kahin aur city se?
Customer: Lucknow se. Aur Rajat ji inko inko ye bataiye ki aapne jo query post kari thi.
Customer: Usme ye grid ka kaam aap karwate ya aapko iski requirement thi?
Customer: Isme hum dekh rahe the requirement nahi thi pata nahi kaise kya lag gaya usme hum kaam karwate hain.
Customer: Aap khud hi kaam karwate ho na matlab aap ek vendor ho na aap ka kaam karwate hain na thekedari karte hain na. Haan haan. To ye baat bataiye madam ko. Haan main thekedari karta hu. Hmm. To aapne waha pe jab aap check kar rahe honge to aapko jo detail bharne ko aaya hoga to aapne wo bhara hoga tabhi to aapki lead ban ke jayegi na sir ki aapko isliye itna order.
Customer: Hum soche ye nahi hum soche ki matlab isme thekedari wala system hai ki koi kaam kar kaam karwane ke through koi aayega is hisab se hum bhare the usko. Sir dekhiye online dikh rahe hain to ye hota hai agar aap online pure national platform pe hain to aapka number aapki profile visible hai koi bhi call message karega hi karega ye cheez to hoti hi hai na buyer pe koi range nahi hota hai. aap chahe galat track mein ja rahi main kya karu buylead purchase kari hai maine inke call message nahi aaya mere paas. Hamara phone na phone aaiye aap baat kuch baatein karke. Sir main ek kaam karti hu main apne senior se aapki baat karati hu main aapse is tarike se nahi baat kar paungi aap jis tarike se bol rahe hain na. Customer kuch aur keh raha hai aap kuch aur samjha rahi hain humko wo keh raha hai ki humne buylead banai thi wo khud wahi kaam karta hai wo bhi wahi vendor hai jo kaam hum kar rahe hain to aap unki buylead kyu bana rahi hai kyu bhai hum galat keh rahe hain? Nahi nahi sahi sahi. Hum dono log hum dono log jo baat keh rahe hain wo aapko nahi samajh mein aa raha apna gyan alag de rahi hain. Nahi hum kaam karwa rahe hain. Suniye suniye mam suniye. Hum ye kaam karwate hain galti se hum humari samajh mein aaya ki isme kaam jo hai isko bharenge to kaam order hamare paas lead ban ke jayegi. Haan suniye sun lijiye sir Rajat ji unhone wo jab wo unhone check kiya hoga to agar wo detail aap bhi bhar ke daal denge na to aapki bhi inquiry ban ke jayegi theek hai buyer ko koi rok nahi sakta agar wo dalenge to wo dalte hain bhai tabhi to aapko itni sari 44 buylead mil rahi hain aapko daily bonus ke aapko call inquiry sare hum kisi ka mind to nahi check kar sakte hain na sir ki ye aisa kar raha hai wo aisa kar raha hai uski requirement hai nahi hai aap national platform pe hain aapko koi bhi call inquiry buylead dal sakta hai aap unhe entertain karenge nahi karenge ye aapki choice hai na. Aur main aapki na baat karati hu main aapki apne manager se bhi baat kara deti hu. Haan bolo manager se baat karaiye. meri baat karaiye. karaate hain. Haan theek hai theek hai theek hai abhi unko dikhao.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer is facing location mismatch issues.

- Customer is receiving buyleads from competitors.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check location issue.

- Executive offered to connect with manager.

- Executive explained buyer's mindset cannot be controlled.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and revert on the location issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, competitors, irrelevant
